## NgxPrimerAccordionRootComponent.disable() method

Disables the specified value(s) by updating their disable state.

If the value is currently enabled, it will be disabled. If the value is currently disabled, it will remain disabled.


**Signature:**

```typescript
disable(value: T | T[]): void;
```

value


</td><td>

T \| T\[\]


</td><td>

The value or array of values to be disabled.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

void
